name: Killer Peach Revenge
description:
Killer Peach Revenge is a First Person Shooter set in a parallel universe in which fruits are the most intelligent beings on the planet and have managed to place themselves at the top of civilization. You play as Killer Peach, a veteran soldier who wants to take revenge and destroy the Peach Juice Factory.

Everything was going relatively well at FruitLand until, due to mismanagement of natural resources and food by the central government, all food in the world goes extinct.

Due to this situation, an extraordinary Council of Ministers meets to decide what to do until a drastic decision is taken led by Minister Mr. Pineapple, kill all the innocent peaches of the world to make juice and save FruitLand from the global famine.

Weeks later from the hunt and being one of the last renegade peaches on the planet, Killer Peach (protagonist character controlled by the player) enters the scene, who travels to the offices of Mr. Pineapple in search of revenge for his fallen brothers and his entire specie. 

Determined to fulfill his mission, Killer Peach will immerse himself in a frenzied adventure in which he must destroy his enemies, dodge a wide variety of obstacles and unravel the mysteries behind Mr. Pineapple's base of operations, all in one spectacle. packed with gunfire, mayhem, explosions, and lots of fruit juice.

In Killer Peach Revenge you'll find:

  • Guns
  • Explosions
  • Epic jumps
  • Fruit juice
  • Slow motion

Game is currently in development, if you find any bug feel free to comment or contact us! Also any suggestions to improve the game would be welcome
